senses.ex: The road was smooth after the repairs.

Tips.title: Physical smoothness
Tips.description: Relates to surfaces that feel flat or even when touched.
Tips.example: The table's smooth finish made it pleasant to touch.

Tips.title: Visual perception
Tips.description: Describes surfaces that look uniform without visible roughness.
Tips.example: The artist's brushstrokes gave the painting a smooth appearance.

Tips.title: Metaphorical use
Tips.description: Can be used metaphorically to describe situations without problems.
Tips.example: After sorting out the issues, the project ran smooth.

senses.ex: The negotiations were conducted in a smooth manner.

Tips.title: No complications
Tips.description: Emphasizes an absence of problems and a sense of ease in scenarios.
Tips.example: Thanks to the clear instructions, installation was smooth.

Tips.title: Efficient processes
Tips.description: Often used in business to highlight efficient and well-functioning systems or processes.
Tips.example: She managed to make the office workflow quite smooth.

senses.de: polite, pleasant and suave in manner
senses.ex: He was smooth with the ladies, always knowing what to say.

Tips.title: Social interactions
Tips.description: Refers to someone who is charming and able to handle social situations well.
Tips.example: His smooth approach won over the skeptical audience.

Tips.title: Slick communication
Tips.description: Used to describe someone who communicates persuasively or convincingly.
Tips.example: The politician's smooth talking swayed public opinion.

senses.ex: She smoothed the dress with her hands.

Tips.title: Action descriptions
Tips.description: Can denote actions that are performed in an uninterrupted, fluid manner.
Tips.example: She danced with smooth, graceful movements.

senses.de: having a consistent and unbroken flow
senses.ex: There's a smooth rhythm to the song.

Tips.title: Entertainment
Tips.description: In music or dance, it conveys a sense of continuous, unhindered rhythm or flow.
Tips.example: He played the saxophone with a smooth, relaxing tone.

senses.de: free from harshness, aggression, or sourness; mild or sweet
senses.ex: This wine is incredibly smooth and easy to drink.

Tips.title: Taste experience
Tips.description: Refers to the pleasant texture or flavor of foods and drinks.
Tips.example: The chocolate truffle's smooth texture melted in my mouth.

Effortless.wordDefinition:
Effortless means something that requires little or no effort or difficulty. It is applicable when describing something that is easy and done without much exertion or strain.

For example, a car ride can be smooth, while making a cake can be effortless.

Even.wordDefinition:
Even means flat and level, whereas the word smooth means free from roughness, bumps or wrinkles.

For example, a road surface can be described as even if it doesn't have potholes or bumps, while a person's skin can be described as smooth if it doesn't have any texture or blemishes.

Even describes surfaces or things that are supposed to be level or flat, while smooth describes surfaces or things that are supposed to be free from roughness, bumps or wrinkles.

Flat.wordDefinition:
Flat means having a level surface with no bumps or curves. It is applicable when describing surfaces like the top of a table, a sheet of paper, or a floor that is even and without any irregularities.

Smooth means having a surface that is free from roughness or bumps. It is applicable when describing surfaces that are not necessarily flat, but rather free from any roughness, like a silk dress, the skin of a baby, or a polished marble surface.

Flat refers to a surface that is level and without bumps, while smooth describes a surface that is free from roughness, regardless of whether it is flat or not.

Fluent.wordDefinition:
Fluent means the ability to speak or write a language easily and accurately. It refers to one's proficiency in a particular language.

For example, someone who is fluent in Spanish can speak and write the language without much difficulty.

To summarize, fluent refers to language proficiency while smooth refers to the way something is done.

Level.wordDefinition:
Level means something that is flat and even, without any bumps or dips. It is applicable when referring to surfaces or objects that need to be horizontal or balanced, such as a table or a floor.

Level is concerned with flatness and stability, while smooth is concerned with texture and feel.

Polish.wordDefinition:
Polish refers to improving the surface of an object by making it shiny and removing any imperfections.

Polish is applicable when talking about making something shiny and clean, whereas smooth is applicable more generally when talking about a surface that is level and without any roughness.

Seam.wordDefinition:
Seam refers to the point where two pieces of fabric or material are joined together, creating a visible line or edge where the two pieces meet.

This is often seen in clothing, where seams can be found along the sides of a shirt or the inseam of a pair of pants.

So, while seam and smooth both describe the way things look or feel, they are used in different contexts. Seam is typically used when talking about the joining of two pieces of material, while smooth is used when describing a surface that is even and free of bumps or roughness.

Silky.wordDefinition:
Silky describes something that is soft, smooth, and shiny like silk.

Silky is mostly used to describe the texture of soft and shiny things like fabrics and hair, while smooth describes even surfaces without roughness or bumps.

Sleek.wordDefinition:
Sleek typically refers to something that is streamlined and has a pleasing shape or design. It's often used to describe cars, boats, or buildings that look elegant and aerodynamic.

Sleek describes shape while smooth describes texture.

Suave.wordDefinition:
Suave refers to someone who is polished and sophisticated in their appearance, mannerisms and behavior.

Smooth refers to something that is even and without roughness, while suave refers to a person's polished and sophisticated behavior or appearance.

quotes.Text: Sometimes when you look at life really closely and you realise that things are not as smooth or as kind as they should be, then you create a world outside that matches up to your expectations or matches up to your beliefs. That's the kind of world both my brother and I have created for ourselves through stage and through entertainment.
quotes.Title: Indian Model
quotes.Name: Kubra Sait

quotes.Text: In the national team you only see each other two or three times a month, which makes it difficult to work on some of the most important aspects of the game. But if you've known each other for so many years, these things go a little more smoothly. It makes everything a little easier.
quotes.Name: Stephan Lichtsteiner

quotes.Text: My parents separated when I was four. It wasn't the smoothest of divorces, but then as my mother always says, you can't have a passionate marriage without a passionate divorce.
quotes.Title: English Musician
quotes.Name: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

quotes.Text: To me, love is everything. I can't think of living without it happily. Only when it's there in my life do things happen smoothly for me.
quotes.Title: Indian Actor
quotes.Name: Naga Chaitanya

quotes.Text: I wish that I did the things that I really believe in, because when I do, my life goes much smoother.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: Cher

quotes.Text: It's never paid to bet against America. We come through things, but its not always a smooth ride.
quotes.Title: American Businessman
quotes.Name: Warren Buffett

quotes.Text: We laid the track on a smooth stretch of ground about one hundred feet north of the new building.
quotes.Title: American Inventor
quotes.Name: Orville Wright

quotes.Text: I haven't seen a single institution in the corporate world operating smoothly without a HR team.
quotes.Title: Indian Activist
quotes.Name: Kiran Bedi

quotes.Text: I don't want to pass through life like a smooth plane ride.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: Henry Rollins

quotes.Text: When life is real, it's not going to be smooth.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: Mary J. Blige
